Actions.Name: Create a user
Actions.Description: Create a new user, and optionally, an access token.

Actions.Name: Delete a user
Actions.Description: Delete the user, revoke all access tokens for the user and delete all associated data.

Actions.Name: Issue a user access token
Actions.Description: Issue a new access token for the user.

Actions.Name: Revoke user access tokens
Actions.Description: Revoke all access tokens for the user.
